00149 /*
00150  * Shared Memory Layout:
00151  *
00152  *    ________
00153  *   | Header |
00154  *   |--------|
00155  *   | GUARDH |
00156  *   |--------|
00157  *   | Index  |
00158  *   |        |
00159  *   |        |
00160  *   |--------|
00161  *   | GUARDI |
00162  *   |--------|
00163  *   |  Data  |
00164  *   |        |
00165  *   |        |
00166  *   |        |
00167  *   |        |
00168  *   |        |
00169  *   |        |
00170  *   |--------|
00171  *   | GUARDD |
00172  *   |________|
00173  */
00174

00240     typedef enum ach_status {
00241         ACH_OK = 0,             
00242         ACH_OVERFLOW = 1,       
00243         ACH_INVALID_NAME = 2,   
00244         ACH_BAD_SHM_FILE = 3,   
00245         ACH_FAILED_SYSCALL = 4, 
00246         ACH_STALE_FRAMES = 5,   
00247         ACH_MISSED_FRAME = 6,   
00248         ACH_TIMEOUT = 7,        
00249         ACH_EEXIST = 8,         
00250         ACH_ENOENT = 9,         
00251         ACH_CLOSED = 10,
00252         ACH_BUG = 11,
00253         ACH_EINVAL = 12,
00254         ACH_CORRUPT = 13
00255     } ach_status_t;

00296     typedef struct {
00297         uint32_t magic;          
00298         size_t len;              
00299         size_t index_cnt;        
00300         size_t data_size;        
00301         size_t data_head;        
00302         size_t data_free;        
00303         size_t index_head;       
00304         size_t index_free;       
00305         int state;               
00306         int refcount;            
00307         int anon;                
00308         char name[1+ACH_CHAN_NAME_MAX]; 
00309         struct /* anonymous structure */ {
00310             pthread_mutex_t mutex;         
00311             pthread_cond_t cond;           
00312             int dirty;
00313         } sync;                   
00314         /* should force our alignment to 8-bytes... */
00315         uint64_t last_seq;        
00316     } ach_header_t;

00345     typedef struct {

00362 #define ACH_SHM_GUARD_HEADER( shm ) ((uint64_t*)((ach_header_t*)(shm) + 1))
00363 
00365 #define ACH_SHM_INDEX( shm ) ((ach_index_t*)(ACH_SHM_GUARD_HEADER(shm) + 1))
00366 
00368 #define ACH_SHM_GUARD_INDEX( shm )                                      \
00369     ((uint64_t*)(ACH_SHM_INDEX(shm) + ((ach_header_t*)(shm))->index_cnt))
00370 
00372 #define ACH_SHM_DATA( shm ) ( (uint8_t*)(ACH_SHM_GUARD_INDEX(shm) + 1) )
00373 
00375 #define ACH_SHM_GUARD_DATA( shm )                                       \
00376     ((uint64_t*)(ACH_SHM_DATA(shm) + ((ach_header_t*)(shm))->data_size))
